title: Harlowe Pilgrim's Oh My Words! 2013
description: An album of Harlowe Pilgrim’s short, humor, and short humor works, all published in 2013 and featured in Harlowe Pilgrim’s Cock and Bull Blog and other questionable (I mean, fine) outlets. The material included herein is intended for adult readers only. So under 18 years old—don’t tell your parents. (That was a joke.)"Wise Ass Crackers" "Harlowe Pilgrim’s ‘Twas Halloween Night" "Get Naked for Valentine’s" ... and more!
author: Harlowe Pilgrim
